Player History
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/30/1986 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1988, off David Palmer (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1988, off Bryan Harvey (NYM)...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1988, hitting .333 with 25 HR, 99 RBI...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 1988, hitting .333 with 25 HR, 99 RBI...
Injured on 5/10/1989 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for one week...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,845,000 through salary arbitration...
